item.title: This Is a Test Page 2
item.description: test 2 If you would like to have what are often referred to as “ugly URLs” (e.g., example.com/urls.html), set uglyurls = true or uglyurls: true in your site’s config.toml or config.yaml, respectively. You can also use the –uglyURLs=true flag from the command line with hugo or hugo server.
